 </DIV>
 <P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B> (16) Subsequent events  </B></FONT></P>

<UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B><I> Private placement  </I></B></FONT></P>

</UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;On February&nbsp;1, 2011,we completed a private placement to sell 6,150,003 shares of Common Stock and 12,000,003 Warrants to
purchase Common Stock pursuant to the terms of a securities purchase agreement (the "Securities Purchase Agreement"), resulting in approximately $15.99&nbsp;million in gross proceeds to us, and
$14.6 in net proceeds after the offering expenses. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
sale included an aggregate of $15,990,000 of Common Stock. The stock price of the Common Stock was $2.60 per share. Each of the investors has entered into a Registration Rights
Agreement which requires us to prepare and file&nbsp;a registration statement with the Securities and Exchange Commission registering for resale by the investors the shares of Common Stock acquired
pursuant to the Securities Purchase Agreement on or prior to 10&nbsp;days following the filing of our 10-K for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2010. </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
warrants are exercisable for an aggregate of 12,000,003 shares of common stock, with 50% of the Warrants at an exercise price of $2.60 per share, with 25% of the warrants at an
exercise price of $2.73 per share, and the remaining 25% of the warrants at an exercise price of $2.80 per share, all subject to certain adjustments. The warrants are exercisable commencing
August&nbsp;1, 2011 and have a term of exercise equal to three years. The Warrants are not redeemable by us. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>F-58</FONT></P>

 </DIV>
 <P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B><I> Fourth Quarter 2009 Discussion  </I></B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;We incurred $20.1&nbsp;million of impairment charges during the fourth quarter in our loss from discontinued operation. In addition,
we recorded a $2.1&nbsp;million gain related to the fair value adjustment to our embedded derivatives and put warrant liability in our continuing operations. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>F-59</FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="kc78701_exhibit_21.1"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_kc78701_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>  Exhibit&nbsp;21.1    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="kc78701_subsidiaries_of_evergreen_energy_inc."> </A>
<A NAME="toc_kc78701_2"> </A></FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><B>  SUBSIDIARIES OF EVERGREEN ENERGY&nbsp;INC.    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>KFx
Technology,&nbsp;LLC*&#151;a Delaware limited liability company </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Evergreen
Operations,&nbsp;LLC*&#151;a Delaware limited liability company. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Landrica
Development Company&#151;a South Dakota corporation 100% owned by Evergreen Operations,&nbsp;LLC </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Bimco,&nbsp;Inc.
(formerly Buckeye Industrial Mining&nbsp;Co.)&#151;an Ohio company 100% owned by Evergreen Operations,&nbsp;LLC </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Evergreen
Energy International,&nbsp;LLC*&#151;a Delaware limited liability company. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Evergreen
Energy Asia Pacific Corp&#151;a Delaware company 96% owned by Evergreen Energy International,&nbsp;LLC </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>C-Lock
Technology,&nbsp;Inc.&#151;a Delaware corporation 92% owned by Evergreen Energy&nbsp;Inc. </FONT></P>

<!-- COMMAND=ADD_LINERULETXT,NOSHADE  COLOR="#000000" SIZE="1.0PT" WIDTH="26%" ALIGN="LEFT" -->
<HR NOSHADE  COLOR="#000000" SIZE="1.0PT" WIDTH="26%" ALIGN="LEFT" >


<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>*</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>100%
owned by Evergreen Energy&nbsp;Inc. </FONT></DD></DL>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ke78701_consent_of_independent__ke702323"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ke78701_2"> </A></FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><B>  CONSENT OF INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;We consent to the incorporation by reference in Registration Statements of Evergreen Energy&nbsp;Inc. and subsidiaries on
Forms&nbsp;S-3 (Nos.&nbsp;333-163246, 333-162720, 333-04298, 333-87774, 333-106207 and 333-12181), and
Forms&nbsp;S-8 (Nos.&nbsp;333-09873, 333-82357, 333-106129, 333-129447, and 333-130336), of our report dated
March&nbsp;14, 2011 relating to our audit of the consolidated financial statements, which appears in this Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10-K for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2010.
Our report dated March&nbsp;14, 2011 relating to the consolidated financial statements expresses an unqualified opinion and includes an explanatory paragraph regarding substantial doubt about the
Company's ability to continue as a going concern. </FONT></P>

(Nos.&nbsp;333-09873, 333-82357, 333-106129, 333-129447 and 333-130336) of our report dated March&nbsp;31, 2010, relating to the 2009
and 2008 financial statements (before the effects of the retrospective adjustments to the financial statements for the discontinued operations and reverse stock split) of Evergreen Energy&nbsp;Inc.
and subsidiaries (which report expresses an unqualified opinion and includes an explanatory paragraph regarding the Company's ability to continue as a going concern), appearing in this Annual Report
on Form&nbsp;10-K of Evergreen Energy&nbsp;Inc. for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2010. </FONT></P>

<TYPE>EX-31.1
<SEQUENCE>5
<FILENAME>a2202656zex-31_1.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-31.1
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
</HEAD>
<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>
<FONT SIZE=3 ><A HREF="#11ZAD78701_5">QuickLinks</A></FONT>
<font size=3> -- Click here to rapidly navigate through this document</font>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>


<!-- COMMAND=ADD_BASECOLOR,"Black" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DEFAULTFONT,"font-family:times;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_TABLESHADECOLOR,"#CCEEFF" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_STABLERULES,"border-bottom:solid #000000 1.0pt;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DTABLERULES,"border-bottom:double #000000 2.25pt;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_SCRTABLERULES,"border-bottom:solid #000000 1.0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DCRTABLERULES,"border-bottom:double #000000 2.25pt;margin-bottom:0pt;" -->


 </FONT></P>

<!-- TOC_END -->
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ki78701_exhibit_31.1"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ki78701_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>  Exhibit 31.1    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ki78701_certification_pursuant_to_sect__cer02454"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ki78701_2"> </A></FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><B>  CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO<BR>  SECTION&nbsp;302 OF<BR>  THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF&nbsp;2002    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I,
Thomas H. Stoner, Jr., certify that: </FONT></P>

<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>1.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I
have reviewed this annual report on Form&nbsp;10-K of Evergreen Energy&nbsp;Inc.:
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Based
on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements
made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>3.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Based
on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the
financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the company as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>4.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>The
company's other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act
Rules&nbsp;13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f))
for the company and have:
<BR><BR></FONT>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(a)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Designed
such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that
material information relating to the company, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being
prepared;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(b)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Designed
such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to
provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting
principles;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(c)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Evaluated
the effectiveness of the company's disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the
disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(d)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Disclosed
in this report any change in the company's internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the company's most recent fiscal quarter
(the company's fourth quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the company's internal control over financial reporting; and
<BR><BR></FONT></DD></DL>
</DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>5.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>The
company's other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the
company's auditors and the audit committee of the company's board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
<BR><BR></FONT>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(a)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>All
significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to
adversely affect the company's ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(b)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Any
fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the company's internal control over financial
reporting. </FONT></DD></DL>
</DD></DL>
 <DIV style="padding:0pt;position:relative;width:100%;margin-left:0%;">
<p style="font-family:times;"><font size=1></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>


<!-- COMMAND=ADD_TABLEWIDTH,"100%" -->


 </FONT></P>

<!-- User-specified TAGGED TABLE -->

<TR><!-- TABLE COLUMN WIDTHS SET -->
<TD WIDTH="48%" style="font-family:times;"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="12pt" style="font-family:times;"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%" style="font-family:times;"></TD>
<!-- TABLE COLUMN WIDTHS END --></TR>

<TR VALIGN="BOTTOM">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>/s/&nbsp;THOMAS H. STONER, JR.<BR>


<HR NOSHADE SIZE="1.0pt" WIDTH="100%" COLOR="#000000">

</FONT> <FONT SIZE=2> Thomas H. Stoner, Jr.</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="BOTTOM">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Title: </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Chief Executive Officer</I></FONT></TD>

</HEAD>
<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>
<FONT SIZE=3 ><A HREF="#11ZAD78701_7">QuickLinks</A></FONT>

<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="km78701_exhibit_32.1"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_km78701_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>  Exhibit&nbsp;32.1    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="km78701_evergreen_energy_inc."> </A>
<A NAME="toc_km78701_2"> </A></FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><B>  EVERGREEN ENERGY&nbsp;INC.    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="km78701_certification_pursuant_to_18_u__cer03819"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_km78701_3"> </A></FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><B>  CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO 18 U.S.C. SECTION&nbsp;1350,<BR>  AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO SECTION&nbsp;906<BR>  OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF&nbsp;2002    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I,
Thomas H. Stoner, Jr., state and attest that: </FONT></P>

<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>1.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I
am the Chief Executive Officer of Evergreen Energy&nbsp;Inc. (the "Issuer"),
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Accompanying
this certification is the Form&nbsp;10-K for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2010, a periodic report (the "Periodic Report")
filed by the Issuer with the Securities and Exchange Commission pursuant to Section&nbsp;13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (the "Exchange Act"), which contains financial
statements.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>3.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I
hereby certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. Section&nbsp;1350, as adopted pursuant to Section&nbsp;906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that based on my
knowledge: </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2>
<BR><BR></FONT>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>&#149;</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>the Periodic Report containing the financial statements fully complies with the requirements of Section&nbsp;13(a) or
Section&nbsp;15(d) of the Exchange Act; and  </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2>
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>&#149;</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>the information contained in the Periodic Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and
results of operations of the Issuer for the periods presented therein. </FONT></DD></DL>
</DD></DL>
</UL>
 <DIV style="padding:0pt;position:relative;width:80%;text-align:left;margin-left:0%;">
<p style="font-family:times;"><font size=1></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>


<!-- COMMAND=ADD_TABLEWIDTH,"100%" -->


 </FONT></P>

<TR VALIGN="BOTTOM">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>/s/&nbsp;THOMAS H. STONER, JR.<BR>


<HR NOSHADE SIZE="1.0pt" WIDTH="100%" COLOR="#000000">

</FONT> <FONT SIZE=2> Thomas H. Stoner, Jr.</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="BOTTOM">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Title: </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Chief Executive Officer and Director</I></FONT></TD>

Securities and Exchange Commission or its staff upon request. </FONT></P>

<BR>
<FONT SIZE=3 ><A HREF="#11ZAD78701_8">QuickLinks</A></FONT>

<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>


<!-- COMMAND=ADD_BASECOLOR,"Black" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DEFAULTFONT,"font-family:times;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_TABLESHADECOLOR,"#CCEEFF" -->

<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ko78701_exhibit_32.2"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ko78701_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>  Exhibit 32.2    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ko78701_evergreen_energy_inc."> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ko78701_2"> </A></FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><B>  EVERGREEN ENERGY&nbsp;INC.    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ko78701_certification_pursuant_to_18_u__cer03819"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ko78701_3"> </A></FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><B>  CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO 18 U.S.C. SECTION&nbsp;1350,<BR>  AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO SECTION&nbsp;906<BR>  OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF&nbsp;2002    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I,
Diana L. Kubik, state and attest that: </FONT></P>

<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>1.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I
am the Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of Evergreen Energy&nbsp;Inc. (the "Issuer"),
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Accompanying
this certification is the Form&nbsp;10-K for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2010, a periodic report (the "Periodic Report")
filed by the Issuer with the Securities and Exchange Commission pursuant to Section&nbsp;13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (the "Exchange Act"), which contains financial
statements.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>3.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I
hereby certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. Section&nbsp;1350, as adopted pursuant to Section&nbsp;906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that based on my
knowledge: </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2>
<BR><BR></FONT>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>&#149;</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>the Periodic Report containing the financial statements fully complies with the requirements of Section&nbsp;13(a) or
Section&nbsp;15(d) of the Exchange Act; and  </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2>
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>&#149;</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>the information contained in the Periodic Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and
results of operations of the Issuer for the periods presented therein. </FONT></DD></DL>
</DD></DL>
</UL>
 <DIV style="padding:0pt;position:relative;width:80%;text-align:left;margin-left:0%;">
